Articles.Content:
Push it, I don't fear death...

Press to duplicate myself, for the good and the bad...

umm... sure why not my clone will share the very.... destructive mind i have.

Press this button ,and you get a free train ride ,but with a slight chance of your car's coupling to break causing you to crash into a pod.

*Press* I like it when people die anyway

Push the button to meet Bladewolf, with a 25% chance of him slicing you to pieces. Stupid quadrupedal AI and his goddamn Chainsaw...

i dont know who that is so il leave that button alone.

button grants you an entire interstellar spaceship and crew and you get to be captain. but there is a xenomorph on board.

i dont know who that is so il leave that button alone.

button grants you an entire interstellar spaceship and crew and you get to be captain. but there is a xenomorph on board.

I press the button with a long handled broom on the assumption that the xenomorph is copying the button.

Button is reset so that you have 50/50 chance of becoming Jeb in KSP vs every copy of KSP being erased from the web and PC's.

NOPE

Push the red button to get a free rocket ride to space,but strapped onto the outside of the rocket,you would die.

LOLNO

press to get a lifetime supply of cookies, but they are all raisin

mashes button

push button and universe explodes, but a new one will be created and you get to be god

Why would't I?

Press the button to be ANYTHING you want. But you will experience pain for eternity

Course, I want to be president of USA/NASA so I can get space going, and a president who dosen't feel pain, so no side-effect!

Press the button to become the president of the USA. 90% Chance you are some other president.

Nah, I my twitchy foot tells me that it is a bad idea.

Press the button to take a tour of the island of sodor ,but with a 1% chance there will be confusion ,and delay.

There is no way! The island does not exist, and who knows what bad things happen in the books.. Unless it is a cheery happy place because then I would press it eagerly.

Press the button to get a nice free avatar but have a 10 percent chance to get possibly a bad and or embarrassing one, that you cannot change

How embarrassing?

I'll don't push it, I already have a nice one (and a little reserve full of them)

Push to understand the universe, but you can't explain it to anyone.

I'd push, explaining it would give other people the chance to steal what new inventions you could make from it anyways.

If you push the button, there is a 50% chance you become Zekes, but also a 50% chance you become me.

No thanks, I preffer to be myself.

Press the button to have a detailed folder with the identity of the person of your choice, but, this person know it.

no, i am not a stalker

press the button to have control over the Earth's nuclear arsenal but there is a 50/50 chance that it won't fire if you decide to launch the nukes

press it, so it won't blow up anything without my permission.

press to bring somebody back to life (a random person)

no because what if it is one of the many people that already hate me

press the button to own the entire internet but you can only control it through a single computer run by windows millennium edition

*Push* I'll just steal a Windows7 PC instead

Press for 99% chance of having a stable version of KSP, with a 1% chance that you will be one of the Kerbals

.. Nah, I'm good.

Push for a cup of tea. 1% chance that you die instantly, 1% chance that the tea is extremely toxic.

nah i don't drink tea

push for a new computer with KSP but there is 33% chance that the computer is used, another 33% chance it is 20 years old, and 33% chance that it is a laptop

Press it and hope that the 20-years old computed is a computer from the future that the Doctor accidently sent back in time.

Press the button to understand Lost.

No? I don't understand what you mean by Lost

Press the button for 25% chance you will rule the world, 25% you will be put into prison for the rest of your life, 25% nothing will happen, and 25% chance you get a free ticket to and fro the Moon. And another 0% chance there is invisitext.

yes for my life is already crappy enough so i might as well

press for a 50% chance that you go to the north pole for 3 years or mars and back for 3 months

*Push* I <3 North Pole and Mars

Push to be killed
